-children.#comment: component Core level 2 in support of ExternProtoDeclare hack for KeySensor

meta.@content: A simple scene to show KeySensor functionality using Interactive Profile.
Mr. Philip Sand Hansel II, mr.phillip@home.com
This won't work because there is no KeySensor implementation yet! Prototype script (written in Java) or native node support for KeySensor is needed.
enabled needs to be changed to exposedField once supported by Script capabilities
An experimental version of X3D JSON encoding is used for this scene.  Status online at http://www.web3d.org/wiki/index.php/X3D_JSON_Encoding
